import React from 'react'; import './App.css'; function App() { const [aboutFeedOpen, setAboutFeedOpen] = React.useState(false); const [addressOpen, setAddressFeedOpen] = React.useState(false); const [infoOpen, setInfoFeedOpen] = React.useState(false); const [followOpen, setFollowFeedOpen] = React.useState(false); const onOpenAboutFeed = () => { setAboutFeedOpen(!aboutFeedOpen); } const onOpenAddressFeed = () => { setAddressFeedOpen(!addressOpen); } const onOpenInfoFeed = () => { setInfoFeedOpen(!infoOpen); } const onOpenFollowFeed = () => { setFollowFeedOpen(!followOpen); } return (
